descriptionSet.description: This calendar poster of Thakur Savadekar Company shows a king together with a fisherman's daughter. He's sitting on the edge of a red boat while laying his left hand on the woman's shoulder. He is holding a bow in his right hand and carrying a quiver of arrows on his back. The woman is standing next to him, holding an oar and wearing transparent garments. There is a red anchor visible not only as a symbol on the paddle, but also leaning against the boat. In the background one can see mountains, a lake and various vegetation.

description-en: This calendar poster of Thakur Savadekar Company shows a king together with a fisherman's daughter. He's sitting on the edge of a red boat while laying his left hand on the woman's shoulder. He is holding a bow in his right hand and carrying a quiver of arrows on his back. The woman is standing next to him, holding an oar and wearing transparent garments. There is a red anchor visible not only as a symbol on the paddle, but also leaning against the boat. In the background one can see mountains, a lake and various vegetation. (gs/tb)

explanatory comments/crosstagging: Info from the Thakur Savadekar & Co. webpage: Thakur Savadekar & Co. Pvt. Ltd. is one of India’s leading Bidi manufacturing companies. We are a team of strong and dedicated achievers and have charted out a defined growth path for ourselves. With an aspiration to reform standards and incorporate innovations in the bidi manufacturing sector, Thakur Savadekar is here with a vision "To be India’s most profound manufacturer and exporter of different types of bidis by delivering high quality products." Our main brands are “Langar Bidi” and “Govind Bidi”. The head office is situated in Pune and the distribution and sales offices are spread across India. (gs)
related hyperlinks: http://www.thakursavadekar.com/, last accessed 2012-02-26, basic information as quoted above. (gs)
